headline: Conspiracies, Witch Hunts, and Divine Delusions
article: A chaotic discussion unfolded, blending conspiracy theories, religious fervor, and violent fantasies. One user claimed, *"there are sex traffickers that use glowing stone, not witches,"* suggesting hidden technology like *"assassins creeds the apple"* for mind control. Others fixated on witch hunts, declaring, *"We're killing witches throughout this village,"* while another warned of *"black projects and technology they don’t understand."* Paranoia extended to systemic oppression, with one lamenting, *"you’re being systematically denied the opportunity to earn money."* Delusions of divine purpose surfaced, such as *"I fused my spirit with God’s will. I am his hand."* Meanwhile, erratic YouTube links and disjointed rants about *"Ultra Instinct Gooning Enoch God-Fusion"* underscored the thread’s instability. Some dismissed the hysteria, retorting, *"your totally delusional,"* but the prevailing tone was one of unhinged suspicion and grandiosity.
